Speaking shortly about Budget 2014 at a Business NZ event.
Budget 2014 is about building on the success we have achieved so far. #NZBudget
Budget 2014 will provide up to $20m to expand the Apprenticeship Reboot by 6000 places to 20,000 places. #NZBudget
More apprentices are getting qualified especially in trades we need for the Chch rebuild and Auck house construction boom. #NZBudget
The Christchurch rebuild creates opportunities for beneficiaries outside Canterbury who want work. #NZBudget
$3k to Chch provides one-off $3000 payments to beneficiaries with a confirmed job offer in Canterbury. #NZBudget http://t.co/d2o9nEIFXH
$3.5m for the $3k to Chch scheme. Operates for 1 yr from July 1 and lets 1000 beneficiaries get the grant. #NZBudget https://t.co/J84fE4Lnam
Our successful programme will mean more jobs, & incomes continuing to rise faster than the cost of living #NZBudget https://t.co/MIneei2zds

RT @JuliaGillardGPE: For Global Action Week @globaleducation, I’m starting @JuliaGillardGPE - my passion for education in tweets. #GAW2014
Today, I am pleased to graduate the 33rd batch of students from the UAE University. A new constellation of citizens joined the 55,000 graduates of our prestigious university since its inception.

Most of the graduates today are the sons of engineering colleges, and then their brothers from the faculties of management, economics and medicine .. Graduates are the real fruit of the efforts of 42-year federal
In my speech to the graduates I assured them that they are moving to a new world and a different life .. moving from a life drawn to them for a life they draw themselves ..
I directed graduates 3 tips .. Life School Do not stop learning .. Do not listen to those who say the word is impossible .. The great dreams make great men
